title: Lf team ex challenger support
body:
lft  play support was chall all last season am d2 dont really play that much solo q trying to get back into it 
 add me YOUCANTSTOPME1 in game. :^)

replies.body:
i'm plat 4 and am looking for a support for my casual ranked team. i'd love it if you could stop by and teach me a thing or two if you're bored. i'm a support player who is switching to adc for next season!

IGN  Mr Von
